subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daniel Murphy, the Mets’ presumptive starter at second base, is hard at work with a former Mets second baseman, Tim Teufel, on improving his play in the field.
snippet: Daniel Murphy, the Mets’ presumptive starter at second base, is hard at work with a former Mets second baseman, Tim Teufel, on improving his play in the field.
